video_prompt: **Prompt: A futuristic figure on a city rooftop actively adjusts their stance, their hair subtly swaying. Their glowing sword shifts as they reposition, while city lights subtly twinkle and fade in the distant skyline, creating dynamic light changes. The figure's expression subtly hardens.**
image_prompt: Full-body, high-angle shot of a pale-skinned person with white hair and bangs, in a futuristic dark grey armored outfit (cropped jacket, mini-skirt, chunky boots). They hold a large sword, left hand on hip, on a concrete rooftop overlooking a dark, neon-lit cyberpunk city at night. Mysterious, stoic, sci-fi aesthetic. subtle blue glow on costume accents.
refined_video_prompt: Subtle postural adjustments unfold, hair gently swaying. A luminous blade's position dynamically alters as its wielder shifts. In the distant skyline, urban lights pulse and recede, creating fluctuating light patterns. Facial features subtly harden, reflecting a deepening resolve.
